column5: Just got home from work and check my email and i got this from Sails !woohoo !Can't wait till nov 30 to spend it !Did anyone else get one ?     Congratulations! You won a $100 gift card to spend on outdoors, fishing and hunting equipment at SAIL! Please answer to this e-mail to claim your price and visit our website to inform us which store you would prefer to claim your price to : www.sail.ca/en/home .    Best,  -------------------------------------------------  Catherine Mayer Thomas Marketing Technician, extension 2408  SAIL Plein Air inc.  [email protected]
Congrats to you!!! You're lucky, I've never won a price in my life....ever!  It's probably a good thing because I probably wouldn't know where to claim it to either.
I guess she didn't use spell check ! lol
For $100 they can spell any way they dang well please.
The question is - how did you win it?  Fill out an entry somewhere?  Michael

Michael..go to SAIL. there facebook site and press the LIKE button !   SAIL Congratulations to our New Openings Contest winners: (Kim Joe,) Ian Kryzanowski and Lucy Kupnicki! The contest started on Friday Nov. 11th and will end on Nov. 30th. More $100 gift card winners next week - it could be YOU! LikeUnlike ·  · Share · 3 hours ago · 4 people like this.. Kim Joe Thank you very much ! Can't wait !
